turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, could you help me with ordering from a a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could you make it soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, would you like to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would, but could you make it light with cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size did you want your black and white in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it as a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick up from the Penn Medicine Perelman Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order there, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti black and white mocha with soy milk and light whipped cream to be picked up at the penn medical center starbucks, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I will.
